com.jjoe64.graphview

Class GraphView

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • com.jjoe64.graphview.GraphView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarGraphView, LineGraphView

    public abstract class GraphView
extends LinearLayout
    GraphView is a Android View for creating zoomable and scrollable graphs. This is the abstract base class for all graphs. Extend this class and implement #drawSeries(android.graphics.Canvas, GraphViewDataInterface[], float, float, float, double, double, double, double, float, com.jjoe64.graphview.GraphViewSeries.GraphViewSeriesStyle) to display a custom graph. Use LineGraphView for creating a line chart.

      • setManualYAxis

        public void setManualYAxis(boolean manualYAxis)
